Class ComparatorUtils

java.lang.Object
ComparatorUtils
public class ComparatorUtils extends Object
Utils that are used in the comparison process

      public boolean validateArgsSize(String[] args)
      Check the number of received arguments.
      Parameters:
      args - Execution args.
      Returns:
      True if the number of received elements is 2. False otherwise.

      public List<String> digestFolderNames(String[] args)
      Treats the received args. Retrives the args received and adds them to a list.
      Parameters:
      args - Execution args.
      Returns:
      List with the arguments received.

    • validateFoldersExistence

      public boolean validateFoldersExistence(String folder1, String folder2)
      Validates that the folders provided by the user actually exist.
      Parameters:
      folder1 - Path to folder 1
      folder2 - Path to folder 2
      Returns:
      True if both folders exist, False otherwise.

      Returns:

    • listFilesFromFolders

      public String listFilesFromFolders(List<RetrievedFile> filesFromFolder1, List<RetrievedFile> filesFromFolder2)
      Lists the files present on the provided folders.
      Parameters:
      filesFromFolder1 - List of files from folder 1
      filesFromFolder2 - List of files from folder 2
      Returns:
      Formated String containing the list of all the files from both folders.

    • listSorter

      public boolean listSorter(List<RetrievedFile> retrievedFileList)
      Sorts the files present in the given list alphabetically from A to Z.
      Parameters:
      retrievedFileList - List of retrieved files.
      Returns:
      True if the sort was successfull. False otherwise.

    • comparateFiles

      public List<FileComparison> comparateFiles(List<RetrievedFile> filesFromFolder1, List<RetrievedFile> filesFromFolder2)
      Conparate the files from the given folders.
      Parameters:
      filesFromFolder1 - List of files from folder 1
      filesFromFolder2 - List of files from folder 2
      Returns:
      List containing all the comparisons performed for the files on the given folders.

    • generateFinalDecision

      public static String generateFinalDecision(List<FileComparison> comparisonList)
      Generates a String explaining whether the files Match or Not.
      Parameters:
      comparisonList - List containing all the comparisons performed.
      Returns:
      "match" if all the match parameters (file names, last modified dates and file sizes) match; "do not match" otherwise.
